item.title: Server-sent Events (SSE)
item.author: kiennt2609@gmail.com (Kien Nguyen-Tuan)
item.description:
The Introvert’s Guide to Real-time Web Updates ğŸ™ˆ

Ever felt like WebSocket is that extroverted friend who’s always trying to start a conversation? “Hey server, how are you?” “I’m fine client, how are you?” “I’m good too!” ğŸ™„

Well, meet Server-sent Events (SSE) - the introvert’s dream come true in the world of real-time web communications. It’s like having a friend who’s totally cool with you just listening while they do all the talking. Perfect, right?
